name: Catris (Gumption)
description:
I'm going to be completely honest - this started as a joke and I have no intentions of making it serious.  You are a cat running around a low-poly world populated by animals.  Collect hats into an ever-growing stack on your head - defying gravity and common sense.

There is no way to remove the hats. 

Available on android phones and Windows PC.

Known bugs: 

  • Sometimes an invisible hat that shouldn't exist becomes part of the stack
  • It's unlikely, but still possible, that you will get the cat stuck somewhere and be unable to jump out.  Restart and lose all your progress.  You'll never get that time back
  • If you find yourself somehow enjoying this game experience, that is a an unintended feature and would be removed in the next patch if I had any intention of patching this game
